DOC.brief_summary: The investigator earlier clinical study 754 young Finnish men demonstrate significant negative association serum 25-OHD concentration acute respiratory tract infection . The present study aim determine whether vitamin D supplementation may decrease incidence acute respiratory tract infection .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Supplementation Prevention Acute Respiratory Tract Infections
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects comprise 164 male conscript military base Finland . Half participant randomly allocate receive 400 IU vitamin D daily half received placebo October March . Serum vitamin D plasma parathyroid hormone concentration determine . Subjects follow 6 month primary outcome number day absent duty due ARTI .
